#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"
#include "frame.h"
#include "../shardmaster/client.h"

namespace janus {

int64_t ShardKvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}

int ShardKvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
    auto is_leader = update_config_if_expired();
    if(!is_leader) return KV_NOTLEADER;
    auto result = replicate_log(oid, "put", k, v);
    return result.status;
}

int ShardKvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
    auto is_leader = update_config_if_expired();
    if(!is_leader) return KV_NOTLEADER;
    auto result = replicate_log(oid, "append", k, v);
    return result.status;
}

int ShardKvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
    auto is_leader = update_config_if_expired();
    if(!is_leader) return KV_NOTLEADER;
    auto result = replicate_log(oid, "get", k, "");
    *v = result.value;
    Log_info("Get returned: %s", v->c_str());
    return result.status;
}

void ShardKvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
    auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
    std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lk{mutex_};


    auto oid = v->data_[0];
    auto op = v->data_[1];
    auto key = v->data_[2];
    auto val = v->data_[3];

    std::string result{};

    if(op == "put") {
        auto shard = ShardKvClient{}.Key2Shard(key);
        sharded_kv_[shard][key] = val;
        Log_info("Inserting (%s, %s)", key.c_str(), val.c_str());
        result = sharded_kv_[shard][key];
    } else if(op == "append") {
        auto shard = ShardKvClient{}.Key2Shard(key);
        sharded_kv_[shard][key] += val;
        Log_info("Updating (%s, %s -> %s)", key.c_str(), val.c_str(), kv_[key].c_str());
        result = sharded_kv_[shard][key];
    } else if(op == "get") {
        auto shard = ShardKvClient{}.Key2Shard(key);
        result = sharded_kv_[shard][key];
    } else if(op == "config") {
        auto new_config = ShardConfig::from_string(val);
        auto my_part = GetRaftServer().partition_id_;
        for(auto& item: new_config.shard_group_map_) {
            if(item.second == my_part && current_config_.shard_group_map_[item.first] != my_part) {
                // Fetch
                sharded_kv_[item.first] = get_shard(item.first, current_config_.shard_group_map_[item.first]);
            }
        }
    }

    if(oid_map_.find(oid) != oid_map_.end()) {
        oid_map_[oid]->Set(result);
    }
}

shared_ptr<ShardKvClient> ShardKvServer::CreateClient(Communicator* comm) {
  auto cli = make_shared<ShardKvClient>();
  cli->commo_ = comm;
  verify(cli->commo_ != nullptr);
  static uint32_t id = 0;
  id++;
  cli->cli_id_ = id; 
  return cli;
}

ReplicationResult ShardKvServer::replicate_log(const uint64_t &op_id, const std::string& op, const string &k, const string &v) {
    MultiStringMarshallable cmd{};
    auto oid_str = std::to_string(op_id);
    cmd.data_.push_back(oid_str);


    cmd.data_.push_back(op);
    cmd.data_.push_back(k);
    cmd.data_.push_back(v);
    std::shared_ptr<Marshallable> s = std::make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>(cmd);
    uint64_t log_index, log_term;

    std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lk{mutex_};
    Log_info("%s shardkvserver raft status", GetRaftServer().server_info().c_str());

    if(op != "config") {
        auto shard = ShardKvClient{}.Key2Shard(k);
        if(current_config_.shard_group_map_[shard] != GetRaftServer().partition_id_) {
            Log_info("Does not belong to my group");
            return {KV_SHARD_NOT_FOUND, ""};
        }
    }



    auto event = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<BoxEvent<std::string>>();
    oid_map_[oid_str] = event;

    auto status = GetRaftServer().Start(s, &log_index, &log_term);
    if(!status) {
        Log_info("Request skipped, not a leader");
        oid_map_.erase(oid_str);
        return ReplicationResult{KV_NOTLEADER, ""};
    }



    Log_info("Performing %s on (%s, %s)", op.c_str(), k.c_str(), v.c_str());
    lk.unlock();
    event->Wait(3000 * 1000);
    lk.lock();
    if(!event->IsReady()) {
        Log_info("Request timed out");
        oid_map_.erase(oid_str);
        return ReplicationResult{KV_TIMEOUT, oid_str};
    }

    auto value = event->Get();
    Log_info("Got value as %s for key %s", value.c_str(), k.c_str());
    return ReplicationResult{KV_SUCCESS, value};
}

bool ShardKvServer::update_config_if_expired() {
    std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lk{config_update_mutex_};
    bool is_leader;
    uint64_t term;
    GetRaftServer().GetState(&is_leader, &term);
    if(!is_leader) {
        Log_info("not a leader");
        return false;
    }

    Log_info("leader, checking config");
    auto diff = std::chrono::system_clock::now() - last_config_check_;
    if(diff < std::chrono::milliseconds{50}) {
        Log_info("config updated recently");
        return true;
    }

    last_config_check_ = std::chrono::system_clock::now();

    ShardConfig sc;
    auto status = get_config(-1, &sc);
    if(status != KV_SUCCESS) {
        Log_info("Failed to get config");
        return true;
    }

    Log_info("Got config: %s", sc.to_string().c_str());
    if(sc.number <= current_config_.number)  {
        Log_info("No config update required");
        return true;
    }

    auto success = replicate_log(GetNextOpId(), "config", "config", ShardConfig::to_string(sc));
    if(success.status != KV_SUCCESS) {
        Log_info("Failed to update config");
        return true;
    }
    return true;
}

uint32_t ShardKvServer::get_config(uint32_t number, ShardConfig *sc) {
    Log_info("Getting config: %d", number);
    auto proxies = GetRaftServer().commo_->rpc_par_proxies_[0];
    for(auto& p: proxies) {
        Log_info("Checking site: %d", p.first);
        auto sm_proxy = (ShardMasterProxy*)p.second;
        uint32_t  ret;

        if(ret == KV_SUCCESS) {
            return ret;
        }
    }
    verify(false);
}

std::map<std::string, std::string> ShardKvServer::get_shard(uint32_t shard_number, uint32_t partition_number) {
    Log_info("fetching shard %d", shard_number);
    auto proxies = GetRaftServer().commo_->rpc_par_proxies_[partition_number];
    for(auto& p: proxies) {
        auto kv_proxy = (ShardKvProxy*)p.second;
        uint32_t  ret;

        std::map<string, string> m;
        kv_proxy->FetchShard(shard_number, &ret, &m);
        if(ret == KV_SUCCESS) {
            return m;
        }
    }
    verify(false);
}

int ShardKvServer::FetchShard(const uint32_t &shard_id, map<string, string> *shard_snapshot) {
    Log_info("returning shard %d", shard_id);
    *shard_snapshot = sharded_kv_[shard_id];
    return KV_SUCCESS;
}

} // namespace janus;
